casebody.data:
Tuesday, October 8, 1991

REHEARING DOCKET

90- 1051. Episcopal Retirement Homes, Inc. v. Ohio Dept. of Industrial Relations.

Hamilton County, No. C-880774. Reported at 61 Ohio St.3d 366, 575 N.E.2d 134. A rehearing is granted sua sponte as to all issues in this cause. This cause is to be decided on the merit briefs previously filed. No oral argument is to be set.

Sweeney, Douglas, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., Holmes and Wright, JJ., dissent.
